page.title: 19Remarks about Horse-Eye
page.content: An attitude that was stumbled across by a 90 year old lady is rather interesting. She said that she had lived on Horse-Eye Level all her life and had seen a lot of change. Something that she did miss was the wealthy landlords. They apparantly used to feel a responsibility towards their tenants and amongst other things provided entertainment in the form of Harvest Suppers and Cnristmas Parties. However, She did say that she appreciated our modern (1980s) health services and certainly a clean, piped water supply.
